subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Hours after the Houston Texans drafted defensive end Jadeveon Clowney with the top pick, quarterback Johnny Manziel went to the Cleveland Browns at No. 22.
snippet: Hours after the Houston Texans drafted defensive end Jadeveon Clowney with the top pick, quarterback Johnny Manziel went to the Cleveland Browns at No. 22.
